properties.description: iso639-2b
properties.title: Language

properties.description: What type of name is recorded.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: A full personal name (when not divided into Family and Given name), full corporate/meeting name,or corporate/meeting name segment.
properties.title: Name Part

properties.description: The given (forename) name segment of a personal name.
properties.title: Given name

properties.description: The family name (surname) segment of a personal name.
properties.title: Family name

properties.description: Title and/or enumeration associated with a name, such as Jr., II, etc.
properties.title: Terms of Address

properties.description: Date(s) associated with a personal name.
properties.title: Dates

properties.description: An organization associated this person at the time that the resource was created.
properties.title: Affiliation

properties.description: Textual role term from MARCRelator terms vocabulary.
properties.title: Role (text)

properties.description: Coded role term from MARCRelator terms vocabulary.
properties.title: Role (code)

properties.description: The controlled vocabulary from which the name was taken.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Use to link the name to the same name in a different language or script.
properties.title: Alternate representation group

properties.description: Use to link a name to a uniform title.
properties.title: Name/title group

properties.description: This is a controlled value. Select the value that best matches (Annual, Quarterly, Monthly, etc.)
properties.title: Frequency

properties.description: marcform
properties.title: Marc Form

properties.description: Number of volumes, years, or issues.
properties.title: Extent

properties.description: Unit of measurement (volumes, issues, pages)
properties.title: Unit

properties.description: Resource processing history
properties.title: Note

properties.description: Description of the publication
properties.title: Note

properties.description: Call number
properties.title: Classification (lcc)

properties.description: Antarctica, Australia, Asia, Africa, Europe, North America, or South America.
properties.title: Continent

properties.description: A political entity considered a country.
properties.title: Country

properties.description: First order political divisions called provinces within a country, e.g. in Canada.
properties.title: Province

properties.description: Regions that have status as a jurisdiction, usually incorporating more than one first level jurisdiction.
properties.title: Region

properties.description: First order political divisions called states within a country, e.g. in U.S., Argentina, Italy. Use also for France département.
properties.title: State

properties.description: A geographical area belonging to or under the jurisdiction of a governmental authority.
properties.title: Territory

properties.description: The largest local administrative unit in various countries, e.g. England.
properties.title: County

properties.description: An inhabited place incorporated as a city, town, etc.
properties.title: City

properties.description: A smaller unit within a populated place, e.g., neighborhoods, parks, or streets.
properties.title: City section

properties.description: A tract of land surrounded by water and smaller than a continent but is not itself a separate country.
properties.title: Island

properties.description: A non-jurisdictional geographic entity.
properties.title: Area

properties.description: Any extraterrestrial entity or space, including solar systems, galaxies, star systems, and planets as well as geographic features of individual planets.
properties.title: Extraterrestrial area

properties.description: The ratio between the actual size and a representation of it.
properties.title: Scale

properties.description: The method of representing the surface of a sphere or other shape on a plane.
properties.title: Projection

properties.description: Coordinates covered by the resource
properties.title: Coordinates

properties.description: Select succeeding if the related newspaper follows the parent, otherwise select preceeding.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: This is a controlled value. Select the value that best matches.
properties.title: Frequency

properties.description: Any restrictions imposed on access to the described materials, e.g., limited distribution.
properties.title: Access Restrictions

properties.default_value: There are no restrictions on access to this material online.

properties.description: Any restrictions imposed on use and reproductions of these materials.
properties.title: Use and Reproduction

properties.default_value: Contact information: Hamilton College, Burke Library, 198 College Hill Rd, Clinton, NY 13323, 315-859-4479, askref@hamilton.edu. Use policy: http://dlib.hamilton.edu/dl/dlget.php?doc=use

properties.description: Information about the metadata record.
properties.title: Record info

properties.description: Designates the rules used for the content of the description, if applicable.
properties.title: Description Standard

properties.description: The code or name of the organization that either created or modified the original record.
properties.title: Content source

properties.description: The date or date and time on which the original MODS record was first created.
properties.title: Creation date

properties.description: The date or date and time the original MODS record was last modified.
properties.title: Change date

properties.description: Contains the system control number assigned by the organization creating, using, or distributing the record.
properties.title: Record identifier

properties.description: Shows the origin or provenance of the MODS record. Use this subelement to record information about the origin, or provenance of the MODS record including what methods were used to prepare the MODS record (machine generated or human prepared) and what transformations have been applied (e.g., the result of converting an existing MARC 21 record to MARCXML and to MODS).
properties.title: Record origin

properties.description: The language of the text of the cataloging in the MODS record.
properties.title: Language information

properties.description: Contains the language(s) of the metadata record.
The language used to catalog the resource.
properties.title: Language of cataloging

properties.description: Whether the language term is code or text.
properties.title: Language term type

properties.description: The authority list from which the term or code was taken.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Contains the scripts(s) of the metadata record.
The script used to catalog the resource.
properties.title: Script of catalogoing

properties.description: Whether the script term is code or text.
properties.title: Script term type

properties.description: The authority used for the script code or term.
properties.title: Authority
